title: FS/FT  T206 Christy Mathewson portrait PSA 3 *SOLD*
author: westwin

posts.post_title: FS/FT  T206 Christy Mathewson portrait PSA 3 *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
*SOLD*
I'm looking to downgrade my Matty to a 2 or 1 to match the rest of my set.
I'm selling for $2800 Paypal FF or $2880 Paypal GS, but a trade for a portrait of Cobb, Young, or W. Johnson with cash either way is good too.
Free USPS shipping with Tracking to lower 48 states. I can add insurance, but it will cost extra.
Thanks.
